dsOverview.title: Daily 5-Degree Northern Hemisphere Time Series Tropospheric Analyses, continuing from 1946

summary.p: The polar-stereographic grids in ds195.0 were interpolated to create this dataset of 5-degree Northern Hemisphere latitude/longitude grids until 1976, when the National Meteorological Center (NMC) began producing its operational analyses on a latitude/longitude grid.
